lines.gurmukhi: inrwDwr ko ADwru Awsro inrwsn ko nwQu hY AnwQn ko dIn ko dieAwlu hY
lines.transliteration_english: Niraadhaar Ko Adhaaru Aasaro Niraasan Ko , Naadu Hai Anaadan Ko Deen Ko Daiaalu Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: God is support of all those who are without any support. He is refuge of those who have no one to take care of them. He is the master of all those who are orphans. He is the haven of mercy for the destitutes.

lines.gurmukhi: Asrin srin Aau inrDn ko hY Dn tyk AMDrn kI Aau kiRpn kiRpwlu hY
lines.transliteration_english: Asarani Sarani Au Niradhan Ko Hai Dhana , Tayk Andharan Kee Au Kripan Kripaalu Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Those who are unable to obtain shelter anywhere, He provides them refuge. For the poor, His name is the real treasure. For blind, He is the walking stick. He showers His kindness even on misers.

lines.gurmukhi: AkiRqGn ky dwqwr pqiq pwvn pRB nrk invwrn pRqigAw pRiqpwlu hY
lines.transliteration_english: Akritaghan Kay Daataar Patati Paavan Prabha , Narak Nivaaran Pratagiaa Pratipaalu Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: To the ungrateful, he is the provider of their needs. He makes the sinners pious. He saves the sinners from hell fire and abides by His character of kind, clement, benevolent and sustainer.

lines.gurmukhi: Avgun hrn krn krqigAw s√çwmI sMgI srbMig rs rsik rswlu hY ]387]
lines.transliteration_english: Avagoun Haran Karan Karatagiaa Svaamee , Sangee Sarabangi Ras Rasaki Rasaalu Hai ?387?

Shabad OS B.translation: He destroys the vices and knows all the latent deeds of everyone. He is a companion who stands by in all thick and thin situations. Such a Lord is the treasure-house of elixir for those who relish His divine nectar.  (387)
